Encapsulates audio capture configuration options.

Method Detail

setLimit

public void setLimit(int limit)
The maximum number of audio clips the device user can record in a single capture operation. The value must be greater than or equal to 1 (defaults to 1).

Parameters:
limit - limit of clips to capture
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if limit < 1

getLimit

public int getLimit()
Returns:
the limit of clips to capture

setDuration

public void setDuration(long duration)
The maximum duration of an audio sound clip, in seconds. Defaulting to -1 => no limit

Parameters:
duration - in seconds

getDuration

public long getDuration()
The maximum duration of an audio sound clip, in seconds.

duration in seconds
